Message: The payment 10000.00 performed on Friday, May 24, 2019 for the control number 2121211322 received  but the policy for the family/group 12321123 - Mwalimu Ummy with the insurance product NX01-1 - National fixed enrolment has not been activated.The allocated payment for the policy is 10000.00 but still  should be paid for activation of the policy.
